verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, all ye nations: \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, all ye \w people|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* mercy \w is|strong="H3117"\w* confirmed \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* truth \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord remaineth \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever.
